mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (book_id, seller_id, buyer_id) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT cr.room_id AS roomId, b.book_id AS bookId, b.title AS productName, b.price AS productPrice, b.status AS productStatus, u.user_name AS otherUserName, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(cm.sent_at), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS lastTime FROM chat_room cr JOIN book b ON cr.book_id = b.book_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = CASE WHEN cr.seller_id = #{userId} THEN cr.buyer_id ELSE cr.seller_id END LEFT JOIN chat_message cm ON cr.room_id = cm.room_id WHERE cr.seller_id = #{userId} OR cr.buyer_id = #{userId} GROUP BY cr.room_id ORDER BY lastTime DESC
SELECT message_id AS messageId, room_id AS roomId, sender_id AS senderId, content, sent_at AS sentAt FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY sent_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (room_id, sender_id, content) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{content})
